Sentencas: Cr diffusion from matrix FeCr alloy (metallic interconnect) results in Cr poisoning of the cathode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells, which recently became an urgent issue to be solved.
Titulo: Cr diffusion at the FeCr/Cr2O3 interface: A first-principles study

Sentencas: The understanding of Cr diffusion at the microscopic scale at the metal/oxide interface can provide a meaningful basis for solving this problem.
Titulo: Cr diffusion at the FeCr/Cr2O3 interface: A first-principles study

Sentencas: In this work, we systematically study the stability of the metal/oxide interfaces and Cr diffusion at the interface by first-principles approach.
Titulo: Cr diffusion at the FeCr/Cr2O3 interface: A first-principles study

Sentencas: Slab models of FeCr (010) surfaces with two types of terminations and Cr2O3 (010) surfaces with four types of terminations are proposed, respectively.
Titulo: Cr diffusion at the FeCr/Cr2O3 interface: A first-principles study

Sentencas: Then eight types of metal/oxide interface models are proposed accordingly.
Titulo: Cr diffusion at the FeCr/Cr2O3 interface: A first-principles study

Sentencas: The interface energy is calculated, and the interface distance is adjusted to determine a stable interface model.
Titulo: Cr diffusion at the FeCr/Cr2O3 interface: A first-principles study

Sentencas: The electronic structure of the interface is also analyzed to further illustrate the stability of the interface.
Titulo: Cr diffusion at the FeCr/Cr2O3 interface: A first-principles study

Sentencas: Finally, the diffusion pathways of Cr atom at the optimized interface are found using climb image nudged elastic band method, and the diffusion barrier and diffusion coefficient are obtained to provide a quantitative guide to the related experiments in the metallic interconnect as well as a useful theoretical support for solving the problem of Cr poisoning cathode in the SOFCs.
Titulo: Cr diffusion at the FeCr/Cr2O3 interface: A first-principles study
